content.p: Make a day of it. Find inspiration as to what else you can get up to while you're in Nottingham at Visit Nottinghamshire. You'll find inspiration to make the most of your time in the city. The Orchard Hotel is directly next to the venue for our graduation ceremonies, located on University Park Campus. Jubilee Hotel and Conferences is located at our Jubilee Campus, which has regular hopper buses to University Park. Both are run by Nottingham Venues. Book now Many graduating students and their guests like to book a meal at a restaurant as part of their celebrations. Bramley's Restaurant is located next to the graduation venue in the Orchard Hotel, but tables book up quickly, so we recommend booking early. There are many restaurants in Nottingham city centre too. Food and drink in Nottingham
